text:
[Verse]
City lights glow at night
Neon signs burning bright
Footsteps echo on the street
Heartbeats sync with the beat

[Verse 2]
Cars rush through avenues
People dance in party shoes
Voices buzzing like a hive
Feel the city's electrified

[Chorus]
City lights city lights
Shining through the sleepless nights
City lights city lights
Guiding us like starry skies

[Verse 3]
Moon reflects in windowpanes
Misty air full of dreams
Every alley secrets whisper
Every corner makes a picture

[Verse 4]
High-rise towers touch the clouds
Laughter heard amongst the crowds
From dusk to the morning glow
City's magic starts to show

[Chorus]
City lights city lights
Shining through the sleepless nights
City lights city lights
Guiding us like starry skies
title: City Lights
